mapper.sql: id, mobil, update_time, create_time, blame, address, next_contacttime, create_person, leads_orgin, Customer_level, remark,telephone
mapper.select: select * from tb_leads WHERE state=1 limit #{page},#{size}
mapper.delete: update tb_leads set state=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_leads (id, mobil, update_time, create_time, blame, address, next_contacttime, create_person, leads_orgin, Customer_level,remark,telephone) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobil,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{blame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextContacttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leadsOrgin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
